body:
Comment 2 by **yarkot1**: 
... another piece of data to add:   there was a (mac I presume) dialog asking if I
wanted to allow network access to this program.    In the first case, it closed on panic
(too quickly to respond to) - so there may be a timing / timeout situation involved (why
it would not repeat w/ time, I'm not sure - it was after once I could hit "ok" that
things started working;   I'll look into how to dis-allow network access and thus see if
it is reproducible this way).
